device.description: 裝置類型, 如:Mini App, Web

os.description: 操作裝置系統, 如Android, Ios, Windows, MacOS

parameters.description: 排序欄位,可帶入lv,bet,deposit任一，未帶時預設lv+customer_id
parameters.name: sortField

parameters.description: 頁接續起始定位,取下頁時在搜尋條件帶回前次最後一條資料的anchorPoint做為定位
parameters.name: anchorPoint

anchorPoint.description: 下頁定位,取下頁時在搜尋條件帶回前次最後一條資料的anchorPoint做為定位

balance.description: 可用餘額，已扣除凍結資金

balanceUsdt.description: 可用餘額Usdt，已扣除凍結資金

parameters.description: 帳變時間(起日) (Required when TransactionTimeTo is present)
parameters.name: transactionTimeFrom

parameters.description: 帳變時間(迄日) (Required when TransactionTimeFrom is present)
parameters.name: transactionTimeTo

Type.description: 帳變類型 Adjustment Bet Commission Deposit Game LuckMoney Rank SmashEgg Swap(buy) Swap(sell) Task Treasure Withdraw

balance.description: 可用餘額，已扣除凍結資金

balanceUsdt.description: 可用餘額Usdt，已扣除凍結資金

amount.description: 申請金額. Greater than 0. Less than 10000000

availableForWithdraw.description: 可提現金額(已扣除提現流水)

feeType.description: 手續費類型 fixed:固定金額 percentage:百分比

currency.description: 申請提現幣種. Allowed Enum
